statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%Computer%';
SELECT COUNT(sale_id) AS total_sales, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY sale_id HAVING total_revenue > 5000
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%' AND revenue > 5000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue, MIN(revenue) AS min_revenue FROM sales_data;
SELECT year, annual_revenue FROM revenue_trends WHERE year >= 2020 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;

SELECT YEAR(transaction_date) AS transaction_year, MONTH(transaction_date) AS transaction_month, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data WHERE YEAR(transaction_date) = 2021 GROUP BY transaction_year, transaction_month ORDER BY transaction_month;
SELECT product_name, AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue, COUNT(*) AS transactions_count FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING transactions_count > 10 ORDER BY avg_revenue DESC;
SELECT trend_id, year, quarterly_revenue, annual_revenue FROM revenue_trends WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY quarterly_revenue DESC, annual_revenue ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT order_date, revenue FROM sales_data LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, revenue AS total_revenue FROM customers INNER JOIN sales_data ON customers.customer_id = sales_data.customer_id
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT customer_name, revenue FROM customers c JOIN sales_data s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT id, product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT rep_name, region FROM sales_representatives WHERE region='East';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data JOIN categories ON sales_data.id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_sales > 100;
SELECT rep_name, region FROM sales_representatives WHERE region = 'East' ORDER BY rep_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT order_id, customer_name, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
